Metadata.title: Starry Ciel
Metadata.description: Embark on an epic adventure with Pixture Traveler, an Idle & Incremental NFT-based game on the Base Chain. Dungeon, exploration, collect, and trade NFT as you journey through a fantastical pixel art world.
